seo: Weblogic,漏洞检测,CVE-2021-2109,JNDI远程代码执行
summary: 该插件用于检测Weblogic Server后台JNDIBindingPortlethandle JNDI远程代码执行漏洞（CVE-2021-2109），通过构造特定请求触发漏洞并验证是否存在风险。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the Weblogic Server backend JNDIBindingPortlethandle JNDI Remote Code Execution vulnerability (CVE-2021-2109) by constructing specific requests to trigger and verify the vulnerability.
